sentences.english: So he swore an oath to him, selling his birthright to Jacob.
sentences.chinese: 以掃就對他起了誓，把長子的名分賣給雅各。

sentences.english: The beautiful topiary trees are witnesses of our marriage.
sentences.chinese: 浪漫鮮花柱見證我們的婚盟約誓。

sentences.english: I swear by my brow groomer.
The mayor pledged himself to close all speakeasies.
sentences.chinese: 市長髮誓關閉所有的非法經營的酒店。

sentences.english: Well ain't this a bitch, girl you swore, you promised.
sentences.chinese: 我沒說騷貨，女孩你發過誓的，你保證過的。

sentences.english: I have sworn-fat, and so I never go home after earning money.
sentences.chinese: 我曾經發過誓，等我掙錢以後決不再回家。

sentences.english: I vow to adhere to the disciplinary rules promulgated by the Buddha.
sentences.chinese: 恪遵佛陀所制戒律規範，誓不違犯。

sentences.english: They pledged to fight for democratic rights.
sentences.chinese: 他們誓爲爭取民主權利而鬥爭。

sentences.english: Then Jacob took an oath by the Fear of his father Isaac.
sentences.chinese: 雅各伯就指自己的父親依撒格所敬畏的上主起了誓。

sentences.english: Vows made in storms are forgotten in calms.
sentences.chinese: 激動時所立的誓，平靜時會忘記的。

sentences.english: Astro Boy, however, promises to be different.
sentences.chinese: 然而，鐵臂阿童木卻誓必與衆不同。

sentences.english: Remember you are under oath. I am.
sentences.chinese: 您要記得您可是宣了誓的啊。

sentences.english: We also must balance the budget and pledge never again to expandthe money supply.
sentences.chinese: 我們也必須平衡預算併發誓決不再擴張貨幣供應量。

sentences.english: The man swore an accusation against her.
sentences.chinese: 那人控告她併發誓說控告屬實。

sentences.english: "Yes, I swore it, but I didn't mean it," said Shahzad.
sentences.chinese: “是的，我發了誓，但沒有當真，”沙扎德說。
